meanings.definition: Hegemons: plural form of hegemon, a dominant leader or ruler
meanings.sent1: In the story, the hegemons of the kingdom made all the important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The hegemons of the business world often have a significant impact on the market.
meanings.sent3: The hegemons of the playground decided to ban the use of certain toys.
meanings.sent4: She emerged as the hegemons of the dance floor, captivating everyone with her moves.
meanings.sent5: The hegemons of the forest, the mighty oak trees, towered over the other plants.

meanings.definition: Hegemons: those who hold power or influence over others
meanings.sent1: The hegemons in the group discussion were able to sway opinions with ease.
meanings.sent2: Political hegemons often shape the direction of a nation's policies.
meanings.sent3: The hegemons of the office break room always get the best snacks first.
meanings.sent4: She became the hegemons of the social circle, her charisma drawing everyone towards her.
meanings.sent5: The hegemons of the classroom, the top students, set a high standard for academic excellence.
